sentences.en: Because of the immunity of the immature insects, it'simportant to spray regularly.
sentences.cn: 由于幼虫对药物有免疫力，因此必须经常喷药。

sentences.en: Defrost the fridge regularly so that it works at maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 定期给冰箱除霜，以便它能发挥其最高效率。

sentences.en: Fox, badger, weasel and stoat are regularly seen here.
sentences.cn: 狐狸、獾、黄鼠狼和白鼬在这里很常见。

sentences.en: He also writes regularly for "International Management" magazine.
sentences.cn: 他也定期给《国际管理》杂志撰稿。

sentences.en: I find it really hard to drag myself out and exercise regularly.
sentences.cn: 我发现要让我自己定期出门锻炼真的很难。

sentences.en: In his fourth year he was truanting regularly.
sentences.cn: 上四年级时，他频频旷课。

sentences.en: In the post-war years her writing regularly appeared in The New Journal.
sentences.cn: 她的文章在战后那几年经常出现在《新日报》上。

sentences.en: It is never a good idea to take sleeping tablets regularly.
sentences.cn: 频繁服用安眠药绝对不是好办法。

sentences.en: Make sure the draining board, sink and plug hole are regularly disinfected.
sentences.cn: 滴水板、水槽和塞孔一定要定期消毒。

sentences.en: Many wildlife parks are regularly invaded by people poaching game.
sentences.cn: 很多野生动物园都时常遭到偷猎之徒的侵入。

sentences.en: Schools regularly bring children to the beach for natural history lessons.
sentences.cn: 学校经常安排孩子们去海滩上博物学课。

sentences.en: The opposition leader has regularly discomfited him in parliament.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导人常搞得他在国会中下不来台。

sentences.en: They may even have raced each other — but not regularly.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至可能曾经相互比试过，只不过不是经常性的。

sentences.en: We meet regularly, once a month.
sentences.cn: 我们定期见面，每月一次。

words.tran_cn: 定期的；有规律的；合格的；整齐的
常客；正式队员；中坚分子
使合法化；使有秩序（等于regularize）
调整；使有秩序；使合法化
定期地；有规律地；整齐地；匀称地

trans.tran_en: at the same time each day, week, month etc
